title: Plat 2 midlaner looking for team for open ladder.
body: Hello, im looking for a team to compete in the open ladder. Im not fussed on the rank of my teammates i just want to improve with a bunch of guys who enjoy the game, with the chance of getting some rp ;).

replies.body: im willing to make a team, im Silver IV promos Silver III but my normals MMR is that around 1500-1600. I can handle myself easily up to about Plat 1 players making mostly map movements mistakes not mechanical errors.
